analysis.description:
TokenBBBasic (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#3-109) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#65-67)

TokenBBBasic._transfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#67-85) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances)

TokenBBBasic.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#6)
TokenBBBasic.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#4)
TokenBBBasic.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x4b317864a05c91225ab8f401ec7be0aeb87e9c12.sol#5)
